resources.string: select distinct b._id,b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) and c.type=1001 limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase

select b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where b.id=?
select o.id,o.arName name,o.arDesc desc, o.startDate,o.endDate,o.pages,o.rank from offer o where (o.enName like ? OR o.arName like ? ) limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase
select c.id,c.arName name,count(ic.itemId) entities,0 offers from category c left join itemCategory ic on c.id=ic.categoryId where c.id=? group by c.id

select distinct b._id,b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) and c.type=1001 AND favorite=1 limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase

select b._id,b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) AND ic.categoryid like ? limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase

select c._id,c.id,c.arName name,count(ic.itemId) entities,1 offers from category c left join itemCategory ic on c.id=ic.categoryId where (c.enName like ? or c.arName like ? or keywords like ?) and type=%3$s group by c.id having entities>0 order by count(ic.itemId) desc limit %1$s,%2$s
select _id,id,uri,arName name from contact where itemid=? order by uri desc
